history.narrative: Law 13-249, the “Administrative Procedure Amendment Act of 2000”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-285, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 8, 2000, and December 5, 2001, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 22, 2000, it was assigned Act No. 13-536 and transmitted to Both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 13-249 became effective on April 3, 2001.
